body.p: Confederate provisional government of Kentucky. Formed at Russellville, Kentucky, on November 18, 1861. Administered by a governor and council of ten. Operated from Bowling Green, Kentucky, until February 1862. Recognized by the Confederate States of America on December 10, 1861. Governor(s): George W. Johnson (1861-1862) and Richard Hawes (1862-1865).
